Interaction.Name: default
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Arrr! Don’t bother me, you slime-swiller!

Interaction.Name: default
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Arrr! Why do you continue to disturb me?

Interaction.Name: use_rope_00
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: This might help you with your lifeboat problem.

Interaction.Name: use_rope_01
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: That is not - that is -

Interaction.Name: use_rope_02
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: *Ahem* Do not interrupt my process, you scurvy lout!

Interaction.Name: use_rope_03
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: If I have need of your services, I will inform you of such!

Interaction.Name: talk
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: You secured the lifeboat, did you?

Interaction.Name: lifeboat_comment_00
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Hm, yes - I judge your work to be sufficient.

Interaction.Name: lifeboat_comment_01
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Sufficient? That was supposed to be your job.

Interaction.Name: lifeboat_comment_02
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Don’t speak back to me, bilge rat! You are testing my patience.

Interaction.Name: lifeboat_comment_04
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Why are you still here? I don’t have time for layabouts.

Interaction.Name: choice
Interaction.Text: You seem to think very highly of the first mate.

Interaction.Name: choice_bart_01
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Bartholomew? Aye, I do - as should you! He has the untameable spirit of a pirate and the dashing beauty of a captain.

Interaction.Name: choice_bart_02
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: All lesser creatures are blessed to look upon him!

Interaction.Name: choice_bart_03
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Oh yeah, I feel *so* blessed to be running his errands.

Interaction.Name: choice_bart_04
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: He - entrusted a task to *you*?! That’s -

Interaction.Name: choice_bart_05
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: That is, perhaps you are not quite the bilge rat you look, after all.

Interaction.Name: choice_bart_06
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Stop it, I’m blushing.

Interaction.Name: use_poster
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Here, I’ve got this poster for you -

Interaction.Name: use_poster
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Here, I’ve got this poster for you from the first mate.

Interaction.Name: choice
Interaction.Text: Here, I’ve got this poster for you -

Interaction.Name: choice_poster_10
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: Avast ye! Can’t you see I’m working?

Interaction.Name: choice_poster_11
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Um...no? You’re just staring at Bart over there.

Interaction.Name: choice_poster_12
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: As well I should! He is true captain material. So sleek, so shiny…

Interaction.Name: choice_poster_13
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: *Ahem* I am, in fact, diligently contriving a strategy to fix this lifeboat’s precarious situation.

Interaction.Name: choice_poster_14
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: But I don’t expect you would understand such an intellectual process. So begone with you, cur!

Interaction.Name: choice
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Here, I’ve got this poster for you from the first mate.

Interaction.Name: choice_poster_20
Interaction.Speaker: Second Mate
Interaction.Text: It’s from Bartholomew? Why didn’t you say something!? Give me that!

Interaction.Name: choice
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Pfft. I didn’t want to talk to you either.
